instructions: Go to the Google Play Store and install All Video Downloader 2018 . Open the app and tap Allow . In the Search box, enter a URL or keywords. Tap the download icon in the lower-right corner of the screen. Tap the download icon to the right of the video quality you want to save. Tap Progress in the bottom center of the screen. This screen displays the overall progress and download speeds for the MP4 file. Tap Finished to view, play, share, or delete the MP4. Open a file manager and navigate to your device's internal storage, then tap VideoDownloader . Tap Download . Play and manage your downloaded MP4s from the app's default save location.

Go to PublicDomainMovie.net . Browse the categories, then tap a movie you want to download. In the left pane, tap Download Movie [Video Format: MP4] . In the dialog box that appears, tap Download link . To watch or manage movies, open a file manager, then tap Downloads . Tap the MP4 file to watch it.
